class proteoform.Proteoform(peptideSequence, modificationBrno, modificationProforma, modificationDict={}, protein_ids=[])ÔÉÅ
ambiguous_spectra()ÔÉÅ

return the number of spectra that are ambiguous

compute_theoretical_fragments(ionTypes, charges=[0])ÔÉÅ

Returns and set a list of m/z of fragment ions and informations on the type/position of each fragments for a given peptidoform/proteoform

get_all_linked_psm()ÔÉÅ

Return a list of linked PSMs even if excluded

get_boundaries_area_ratio()ÔÉÅ

Area under EP for interval min_boud_rt max_bound rt vs total AUC

get_boundaries_of_ep(area_percent=0.95)ÔÉÅ

Return the max and min retention time that represent 99?% of the elution profile AUC

get_gap_in_validated_spectra(rts)ÔÉÅ

Returns the ‚Äúgap score‚Äù which indicates the proportion of spectra within the elution range of the proteoform that are not assigned to that proteoform when they would be expected to be

get_linked_psm()ÔÉÅ

Return a list of linked PSMs that haven‚Äôt been excluded

get_number_linked_psm_Rx(rank)ÔÉÅ

Return a the number of element in curated list of linked psm whose rank is equal to x

get_number_validated_linked_psm()ÔÉÅ

Return a the number of element in curated list of linked psm whose self.is_validated = true

get_proteoform_total_intens_r1(method='precursor')ÔÉÅ

Return rank 1 quantification of that proteoform

get_proteoform_total_intens_rplus(method='precursor')ÔÉÅ

Return rank 1 quantification of that proteoform

get_ratio_left_right()ÔÉÅ

get the ratio of psm before max elution peak and after max elution peak RT

get_rt_center()ÔÉÅ

returns rt ‚Äúcenter‚Äù based on the weigthed average of psm‚Äôs precursor mass

get_rt_range(rank=1)ÔÉÅ

returns the RT range for linked psm of rank <= rank

get_rt_range_centered(window_size_rt)ÔÉÅ

returns the RT range for linked psm of rank <= rank

get_validated_linked_psm()ÔÉÅ

Return a curated list of linked psm whose self.is_validated = true

get_weighted_number_linked_psm(max_rank)ÔÉÅ

Returns the sum of linked PSM weigthed by their rank

get_weighted_number_linked_validated_psm(max_rank)ÔÉÅ

Returns the sum of linked PSM weigthed by their rank

is_ambiguous(ratio_miss=0.5)ÔÉÅ

if more than ratio_miss of the spectrum assigned to that proteoform contanins missing distinguishing ions, return true

model_elution_profile(elution_profile_score_threshold=None)ÔÉÅ

instanciate an envelope object by providing the list of psm associated to that proteoform

update_proteoform_total_intens(method='precursor')ÔÉÅ

Return the sum of intensities of psm of that proteoform method = precursor or annotated (correspond to the intensity value used)
